description:
This bag’s aerodynamic shape means it throws like a dream. With flotation sewn around the girth, the bag is still pliable and easy to stuff into odd-shaped places until needed. The multi-filament braided polypropylene line floats and resists mildew. An affordable option recommended for swimmer recovery.

  • High-tenacity 420-denier packcloth makes the bag durable enough for rope replacement
  • Small has 21.3m (70ft.) of 6.4mm (¼in.) polypropylene line with 363kg (800lb.) tensile strength
  • Large has 21.3m (70ft.) of 9.5mm (⅜in.) polypropylene line with 816kg (1800lb.) tensile strength
name: North Water Wedge Poly Throw Bag
